#summary The problem when you're using dtool from your IRC Client.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

When you run *dtool* from your IRC Client and your default player is mplayer, probably it's going to show a large output messages in your IRC Client window. It happens in almost the whole window what really make your last conversation confusing.


= Details =

You should download it from [http://dtool.googlecode.com/files/patch-mplayer here]. After download the patch, go to the dtool source directory and follow the commands below:

{{{
patch -p1 < patch-mplayer dtool.c
}}}

After it, the patch should fix your output problem. Just compile it and enjoy :)

{{{
gcc -o dtool dtool.c
}}}

_o/
